name: Jabra SPEAK 710 - Speakerphone hands-free - wireless - Bluetooth | Dell USA
description: Enjoy high quality sound in a premium portable design for your calls and music with the Speak 710 speakerphone. The first truly professional and personal wireless conferencing device, the Speak 710 boasts an Omni-directional microphone for up to 6 'in room' attendees, 15 hours battery life and a HiFi grade speaker for crystal clear conversation and music.
